title: Turkey and Spinach Stuffed Peppers
directions: Brown the ground turkey in a skillet over medium-high heat. Season with basil and garlic powder. Add tomato sauce to the skillet, stir it all up, and let simmer for a few minutes so the flavors come together.
Add spinach to the skillet, and stir until wilted.
Meanwhile, cut the tops off the bell pepper, cut it in half, and remove the seeds. Arrange the pepper halves on a baking sheet.
Divide the turkey and spinach mixture among the pepper halves, and bake for 25 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 lbs. turkey, ground, grass-fed or pastured, organic
1 lrg. bell pepper, red, fresh, organic
